medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset abdominal pain primarily in mid-epigastric region localized to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started this morning and has continued to worsen throughout the day. The patient has not been febrile but has experienced chills and has had no appetite.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Admission approximately one month ago with upper abdominal pain, suspected gastric ulcers; IUD placement approximately 2 weeks ago.
